article_title: IRS explains PPACA for plain folks
article_text:
The PPACA draft mandate exemption form explains who grants which exemptions.

The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) has posted drafts of two major new health law guides for taxpayers.

The guides are complicated enough to send some consumers who look at them straight to tax preparers.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: The agency has also released three PPACA interpretation notices.
